products.name: Jessie Leather Bootie
products.brandedName: Munro American Jessie Leather Bootie
products.description: Introducing the Munro Jessie Leather Bootie - a stylish and comfortable addition to your footwear collection. Crafted by the esteemed brand Munro, known for their high-quality products, these booties are perfect for fashion-forward women who value both style and comfort.Designed based on valuable feedback from members, this particular item typically runs small, so we suggest sizing up for the perfect fit. The luxurious chestnut leather material adds a touch of sophistication, making these booties versatile for various occasions.The Munro Jessie Leather Bootie boasts practical design details such as double gore construction, allowing for easy slip-on styling. The slip-on feature saves you time while providing a snug and secure fit. The moderately padded footbed ensures ultimate comfort, making these booties suitable for all-day wear.With a rubber sole, these booties offer excellent traction and durability, ensuring confident and stable steps wherever you go. Whether you're strolling through the city streets or running errands, these booties will keep your feet comfortable and supported.What sets these booties apart is their Made in the USA tag. Supporting local craftsmanship, Munro takes pride in producing their footwear domestically, ensuring exceptional quality and attention to detail.Elevate your style while experiencing superior comfort with the Munro Jessie Leather Bootie. Order yours today and add a touch of elegance to your wardrobe.

products.name: Crown Vintage Milena Wedge Sandal
products.brandedName: Crown Vintage Milena Wedge Sandal
products.description: Brunch with the girls, your cousin's graduation party, and your neighbor's backyard barbeque- looks like you're booked this weekend! Busy days call for a classic- that's why this season, we're reaching for the Milena wedge sandals from Crown Vintage. What they are: A pair of sandals, complete with a fisherman-inspired strappy upper, a standout platform, and an ultra-high heel. Why you’ll love them: The timeless silhouette and neutral hue seamlessly matches with your favorite warm weather outfits, while the wedge heel keeps your strides sturdy. How we’d wear them: Opt for a tiered sundress for a look that is breezy and stylish. Finish off the look by accessorizing with goldtone jewelry and a round raffia purse.

products.name: Adirondack Parka 2.0
products.brandedName: UGG Adirondack Parka 2.0
products.description: 3-in-1 convertible quarter-length hooded tech parka with internal jacket Temperature rated at -32° Celsius \r\n Parka: Self - Waterproof Woven - 62% Polyester / 38% Cotton Waterproof tech fabric shell (Fabric passes AATCC127 Water Proof Test- rain or snow cannot penetrate the fabric) Lining - 100% Nylon Fill - 90/10 Premium Certified RDS down with 700 fill power Adjustable cuffs for increased weather protection Chest welt pockets with snaps Front patch pockets with UGG® logo snap closures Soft fleece "hand warmer" pocket linings Internal drawcord at waist Internal cell phone pocket Side vents with zipper closures for addded mobility Reverse coil waterproof zippers with UGG® logo metal pulls UGG® silicone logo patch 35" HPS Length [Size S] Dry clean only \r\n Internal quilted and plush fleece jacket: Reverse to wear plush fleece face out when worn alone Self -100% Polyester plush fleece, 55% Polyester / 45% Recycled Polyester Lining - Unlined Fill - 90/10 Premium Certified RDS down with 700 fill power Storm cuffs with thumbhole Reverse coil zippers with UGG® logo pulls Drawcord with UGG® logo stoppers at hood Side welt pockets Soft fleece "hand warmer" pocket linings 28" HPS Length [Size S] Dry clean only Imported Offering protection from the weather, be it mild or wild, the Adirondack parka is three jackets in one. The outer shell of waterproof tech fabric keeps you dry and rebuffs the wind. The removable and reversible inner jacket features quilted and plush fleece. Its premium down fill means this parka is rated for temperatures as low as -32°C (-25.6°F) when worn together.

products.name: Women's Techloom Zipline Running Shoes In Molten/pristine/ribbed
products.brandedName: APL Athletic Propulsion Labs Women's Techloom Zipline Running Shoes In Molten/pristine/ribbed
products.unbrandedName: Women's Techloom Zipline Running Shoes In Molten/pristine/ribbed
products.description: When fashion meets function.Featuring a seamless TechLoom construction the single layer upper provides lightweight breathability throughout, with engineered ribbing along the tongue and collar to provide stretch where it's needed. The new APL TechLoom Ziplines completely surround the upper, providing both lateral and longitudinal support without compromising flexibility. The hollow cord APL TechLoom Ziplines keep the weight low and shoe balanced to help you perform your best. The sleek upper is fitted atop the maximum cushioning APL FutureFoam midsole, with internal Souffle sockliner for long-lasting and responsive cushioning. Machine washable. 8mm drop. 7.7 oz.

products.brandedName: Brochu Walker Cy Stripe Sweater
products.description: Cy Stripe Sweater Cy Stripe Sweater 33% viscose 23% nylon 20% merino wool 20% cotton 4% cashmere. Made in China. Dry clean only. Button detail at shoulder. Lightweight knit fabric. BROC-WK118. NKM4146. Brochu Walker is The New American Minimalism - Conscious luxury with European flair. Its understated, rich nature is the ultimate luxury and its attention to detail is thoughtful, deliberate and discreet. The effortless collection is defined by a quality over quantity, less is always more mindset, giving way to refined, alluring pieces that are personal, yet have a definitive character.
